content.label: This game became my favorite very fast! I loved it! I wish they would make another one like it. Definitely worth the $5!
This is a great game and its really fun but if you have an xbox game pass(on the xbox) you can get the whole game for free(well you know like try the whole thing out free)
Please, please, it’s so darn awful, give us a chance to turn it off, it completely ruins the game, and i am not exaggerating at all, ugh. If i’d known about the music i would not have bought it...

A truly amazing game! The graphics are amazing. I love how you can make your own decisions and the music. A perfect combination of mystery, supernatural, and comedy. I have played this game so many times seeing what other endings I could uncover. There are many scares and sentimental moments! In general I love this game but I want more. I would love if there is a before, more in depth storyline for the game. Basically I was hoping for a “before they got to the island” app. Expecting more on how Alex’s brother died, their parents,How  Alex got her hair dyed.

Thanks again for this amazing game and thanks for reading.

Love the game in pc and iPad but for whatever reason I can’t get full screen on my iPhone 12 Pro Max. It’s probably something to do with an update. However, seeing as though this developer has put this game on iOS the wayside, I’m probably out of luck.

title.label: The only thing I don’t like about this game.

content.label: It’s full version is of it is free with game pass to play on Xbox One. Then you can play though the open story part here but half to pay in order to play the full game then to play the game on android or iOS device with google play store at all, you have to buy it 1st before you can download it when on iapp store on any apple mobile device you can download it for free then play a bit until it says you have to buy the full version to play the whole game. I will give 5 stars anyway just because I’m nice. Not because I wish to.

title.label: Can’t put into words how much I loved this game.

content.label:
First off loved that there is a free trial. I love that I had an opportunity to be able to try the game before purchasing it. I hate buying a game and realizing after the purchase, it was not for me. 

Second the story line was so interesting I couldn’t put the game down. I was so worried I would make a wrong choice and lose one of the characters. Yes even Clarissa. Smh. Even to the end made me want to play another time to see where the story would take me. I can’t leave out how great and relatable the personalities of each character, the interactions btwn them and how the dialogue was what I would might actually say as a response. You guys are imaginative, creative and fun. I would love to spend a day with you and pick the brain of the creator. 

Lastly I loved the art. It was beautiful. I can’t wait to see or play any game that is made by you guys. I rarely write any review whether it’s positive or negative. Just don’t have the time, but I had to write this one. I just couldn’t leave without giving you guys your earned positive review. You guys really got me through a tough week where I could leave my chaos and disappear into fun, thrilling and exciting place. Thank you!!!!!!
It’s good. At least the first part I got through. Paid for the full and it still tells me I need to pay for the full??
I never ever pay money for games what so ever, but I did this once. The animations are amazing, mixed with being able to move around characters, its amazing.

I never write reviews unless the game has amazed me and this game has. Recently I have been downloading a lot of Indie games and this one has been the best one yet. The graphics are on point and the art style is unique. The characters’ backgrounds are very emotionally stimulating and the game invests you from the beginning. The storyline is so interesting with so many endings. If there was a Oxenfree 2 I would definitely play it.

title.label: Great but I need help with something please reply

content.label:
So the game is wonderful, but I can’t get past the level where your in the cave and are supposed to use the radio. What am I supposed to do at that part? I took the radio out and put it on the area where it wasn’t static, but it did nothing. I sat for a hour with it in that area, but nothing happened. I thought maybe I needed to buy the full story, so I did and it still didn’t work. Please help me.
 Besides for that problem, it’s pretty amazing so far. Please reply on what I’m supposed to do there though. Again this is a great game it just doesn’t work for me at one part.   I 100% recommend downloading this game, despite how much trouble I’m having.

title.label: Will change to 5 stars if you can shut off the music

content.label: Not having a music volume slider is insane. I find subtitles distracting and like to have them off, but the music is so loud (and irritating) that you can barely hear the dialogue. Finally had to stop playing after twenty minutes and doubt I’ll go back into the game until this is fixed.

i love the game but i can never get through the first part because it keeps crashing on me time and time again. it’s just frustrating every time i relaunch the game, i basically have to play the opening over again only to get to the place it crashes without fail. wish i could get a refund.

title.label: It's got a great story, but...

content.label:
I bought this game when it first came out. I loved it, it was fun, something I could do in study hall, or when I was bored, but now I come back, two years later, and there's a full version I have to pay for? No, not going to happen. I would truly like to play the full version, but I don't need to be leeched out of paying an extra 4 or so bucks, that I already payed years back.

I’m back again, and I’ve still got to pay money for a game I already bought three years ago. Still mad, I feel scammed of my money. Everyone might want to be careful. You may have bought it now, but just wait til they make an update you weren’t expecting and make you pay again.
amazing. wow. scared the crap outta me. DO NOT play if you are epileptic.
I purchased the app but I’m unable to continue on to epiphany fields, so I’m sort of just stuck?

Okay, the quality isn’t bad, the games overall good, but i got in for 5 mins and got kicked out. Tried again. Same thing. So, it was good for the 5 mins i got in. Fix pls. I cant get in. Also, the loading takes a lot of time.

Ok, I’ve been playing this game for like 6 of the last 12 hours, so I feel reasonably qualified to say this game is killer. It’s got a good balance of eerie and sweet, enough that I’m looking over my shoulder when I hear weird noises, but I’ll still be able to fall asleep. The gameplay is giving me some serious tv show vibes (Locke and Key, Haunting of Hill House, and even Stranger Things, all for reasons I won’t explain, bc spoilers). I’ve played it about 1.5 times at this point, and I really like that it has enough structure so I don’t really get stuck, but my choices (apparently) can still lead to slightly different outcomes! Even though I’ve “finished” the game, there’s still a lot more for me to discover, and (hopefully) a few more outcomes! Really makes it feel worth the $5, since I will definitely play it again. Also want to mention that I LOVE how there’s some... aftereffects playing it the second time. My only complaint would be that the movement can be a little buggy sometimes, like it won’t let me climb up a wall, and I just have to walk away and come back a couple times. Even with this minor issue, I 10/10 recommend this game to anyone who enjoys a bit of creepiness!

Okay, I NEVER write reviews for games. Like, ever. But this game is really amazing, and I was on the App Store anyway, so here you go!!!

This game is amazing, ABSOLUTELY worth the money. I’ve played it over and over and over, and I am never disappointed with the amount of new choices; I love the plot, the characters, and the humor and horror that are beautifully blended together. I will say that moving the radio, switching channels, is a little tedious at times. I also wish this game had a save button, or saved at any point between entering the bomb shelter and the very end. But— and I cannot stress this enough— THE GAME IS WORTH IT. It’s been like three months since I got it, and I can’t stop replaying.

This game is amazing. It’s chilling, funny, heartwarming, and beautiful. I cannot write a good enough review, but I hope this will do. 🙂

title.label: I like the game but I’m disappointed

content.label: I bought the full version of the game several years ago. And I played the whole thing through to the end. But recently, I wanted to play it again. And when I went to play it, it said I had to buy the full version. So I’m disappointed as I’m not wanting to buy it again. But the game play is amazing and unique with a cool story line.
I seriously love this game, you need to make a second one!

I was glad I got this game I bought it about 2y ago and it was quite amazing the story, how you play the game it’s unique in it’s own way and the decisions you make affect the rest of the game. But  since I got this for I think about 4.99 about 2y ago and I wanted to start playing it again since I haven’t finished the game yet.But I don’t know if I have the full version of the game or not because I looked at the in app purchases and it said to buy the full game and I was a bit confused. But anyway this is a amazing game and you should play it
i found this game and it sounds like one my husband would use let see
Too much dialogue
This game should be free. THE WHOLE GAME!!! Unfair.

So I really love this game I don’t read a lot of reviews on games but this game got me thinking and got me to a new point in my own life I suggested a scheme to anyone who is looking for an escape from every day ordinary life I hope they come out with the second one or a sequel of some kind

This game is amazing but it needs updating. Playing it on my XS isn’t the same, it doesn’t cover the entire screen when playing so I get to see the time and cell coverage ALL the time during the game. Which is very distracting and annoying.

I recently purchased the full game in hopes to play it on my iPad with my Gamevice controller, however, I am unable to use the push buttons. At first I thought this might be an issue with the controller but my other Gamevice compatible games are not experiencing this problem. Weirdly enough, the left joystick works and I’m able to walk but not select any options. I’ve restarted multiple times to no avail. A real bummer since I’ve been wanting to play this game for some time now.
It’s honestly a little creepy without being scary I really like it and the animation is pretty cool
One of the best games I’ve ever played, please done stop making stuff like this you guys are just amazing
If you enjoy watching people walk around a town and regurgitate poorly written dialog, this game is for you. Not at all worth $5 or your time.
Downloaded game.  Three time clicked on the game. Three times it opened to a blank screen and then turned off.  I deleted it.

This game is...something else.

The characters are very likable (yes, even Clarissa at times), it has an amazing story. It’s a game I’d suggest to all horror fans and even non horror fans. There is something in the game for everyone and anyone.

Also, I suggest listening to Vaporwave music or the Stranger Things soundtrack while playing this. It makes it so much better. Then again, there is the already amazing soundtrack within the game itself :D

title.label: Seems cool but cant even get past the tutorial

content.label: I think it would be a very fun and cool and beautiful game. But I can’t get past the tutorial because it won’t let me tap on the radio or the pause because it’s off screen or something. I can see it but when I tap on it nothing happens. I don’t know if it’s just my phone model (XR) or what but the game doesn’t even take up all of the screen, there’s like half an inch or so of black, open screen that could be used. It’s extremely difficult to admire the hard work that was put into the art and story that is clearly put into the game because you can hardly even see the game. I understand that you have to pay to get the full game which makes complete sense because you wouldn’t want ads popping up in the middle of the story and the devs need the money to make more games and what not. My only problem is that I don’t know what I’m looking at or if it’s even worth paying for the full game if I can’t see anything. I would love to test out the game further than maybe 1 and a half minutes to see if it’s worth buying. I can tell that this game is amazing already from the little time I spent playing. I hope this can be fixed somehow and I hope that this helps!

Had to purchase the game twice due to the in app purchase glitch not working...I suppose it doesn’t help that while it was downloading I quickly bought it and it didn’t register...STILL no regrets ,amazing game!

It’s rare that a game gives me chills, but Oooooooooweeeeeeeee

Straightforward and coherent plot, great graphics, and pretty cool concepts. Play if u have a day off because it ate up my day
I wish it was free ☹️
I only have the free one,I’m thinking about buying it! Even the free is really good quality! The audio is amazing and the story is interesting and the price is really good!
When I tried to use the radio at the gate it wouldn’t work, and I couldn’t leave the area. Love this story so much but I can’t finish it because of this bug :( want my money back or the bug fixed.

I loved this game.i loved the fact it was a based choice game and the characters where so funny my favorite caracter overall was jonas. I highly recommend this game and I the reason is because when u play u feel like u are really in the game and it gives u   So much a motion and this game blew my mind especially the ending. So if u haven’t played this game u should!!💙

name.label: im a person do fight me bro

content.label: This is probably the best game I’ve ever played! If you have any chance to buy it, do it! It’s not scary, but has a creepy vibe to it. The plot, the talking, the graphics. They are just amazing! I would 100% buy this! It’s a fantastic game for only 5$!

title.label: Genuinely one of my favorite games

content.label:
I rarely feel the need to go back and replay games after I’ve been all the way through, but I have played this at least three maybe four times (which considering how dense this game is...won’t say more due to spoilers...is saying a lot in my opinion) and I have enjoyed it just as much every time. 
It’s just...really really good. Not much more to say than that honestly. It’s just a stellar game. In fact...might be time for another play through.
I love the game
I haven’t been able to play this game once. I pre ordered this app and not once has it worked. It always crashes.
Anyone who downloads this game I promise you’ll love it. 💯 I totally recommend this game to anyone🙏🏻this game is so addicting I literally finished it just in two days 😂. But yes DOWNLOAD IT💯

This game was great. A lot of thought must have gone into it.  I loved it.  It was that creepy but interesting environment that had a little bit of everything dark. Being part of the story was really fun.  But I wish they would have given more time to make a choice when the three bubbles came up.
Still, it was worth a lot more than $5.
The game is good but at the end, why do it have to end like that I would love it even more if you don’t have to pay
I like this game lol but I’ll come back when it’s free ✨

You guys should totally mak another part! I feel like there should be more to the story!! Maybe like the ghosts go back to haunting Alex... or something?! But seriously you guys should definitely make a part 2 I really enjoyed it! And again I feel like there is more to the story. I don't want it to be over!

When I first saw the game I knew it would be for me the game lit something in me that I never knew about. It had gameplay that that games like it never had it was truly a masterpiece I have been telling my friends lately about it and they said they would try it out. But overall the gameplay is 100% perfect
